participant_1.name: Sophia
participant_1.personality: outgoing and adventurous, with a passion for luxury items and shopping.
participant_1.background: i currently work for a watch dealer. my family does not support my career choices. i often shop for shoes and watches. i like shopping. my dream car is a rolls royce ghost.

participant_2.personality: friendly and humorous, enjoys outdoor activities and sports.
participant_2.background: i've a german shepherd dog. i live is a rural farming community. my husband is adopted. i like to watch nhl hockey.
